fact: He is the de facto leader of the Autobots.
His nickname is Hatchet (don't ask why).
His nickname is Buckethead (again, don't ask why).
No one has ever heard of Soundwave's voice since he swore the oath of silence in Kaon.
From him, we learn that not all Decepticons are pure evils.
Arcee is very good at masking her emotions, even when faced with tremendous loss.
A fierce warrior to the Decepticons, a loyal friend to the Autobots.
Honestly, he should lose his T-cog again so we can see more of him in heels XD.
The last of the Thirteen original Primes.
